summary: The video discusses the 2024 Chevy W/T, highlighting it as the cheapest brand-new truck available. The narrator critiques the lack of features despite the truck being priced at $44,465, noting that it is actually listed for $39,000 on the website. The focus is on the minimal options included in the base model, such as basic power mirrors instead of power folding ones, and simple alloy wheels. The video aims to provide a detailed review of the truck's specifications and value.
keywords: Chevy W/T, 2024, cheapest truck, new truck, vehicle price, options, remote start, remote tailgate, power mirrors, alloy wheels, General Grabbers, monroney sticker, standard vehicle price
creator_demographic: Age: Unknown, Gender: Unknown, Geographic Location: Unknown
